rules_text:
Kicker {3}{R} [i](You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Seskrin’s Apprentrice enters, if it was kicked or if you control a God, unearth target artifact or creature card. [i](To unearth an artifact or creature card., return it from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
